AccountGroup - Class in com.poesys.accounting.dataloader.newaccounting
A data transfer object containing data about a category of accounts, such as Cash or Accounts Receivable; each account has an associated group, but the group does not track the accounts that it groups

Create a AccountGroup object.
AccountGroup - Class in com.poesys.accounting.dataloader.oldaccounting
Data transfer object representing old-accounting account group data; groups the accounts into categories like Cash or Accounts Receivable by grouping the account numbers into ranges.

AccountMap - Class in com.poesys.accounting.dataloader.oldaccounting
Data transfer object for the account mapping data, which maps a fiscal year account number to a new-accounting account name, enabling the data loader to map accounts in any given fiscal year to the accumulating set of accounts that span fiscal years in the new accounting system; there are 2 data fields, account number and account name
AccountMap(Float, String) - Constructor for class com.poesys.accounting.dataloader.oldaccounting.AccountMap
Create a AccountMap object.
AccountMap(BufferedReader) - Constructor for class com.poesys.accounting.dataloader.oldaccounting.AccountMap
Create a AccountMap object.
accountMap - Variable in class com.poesys.accounting.dataloader.oldaccounting.OldDataBuilder
lookup map that translates account numbers to new-accounting account names; permits mapping of incoming accounts for the current fiscal year to existing accounts from prior fiscal years by name mapping
AccountMapStrategy() - Constructor for class com.poesys.accounting.dataloader.oldaccounting.OldDataBuilder.AccountMapStrategy
 
accountNameMap - Variable in class com.poesys.accounting.dataloader.oldaccounting.OldDataBuilder
lookup map that translates account names to new accounts; this provides a way to get the account object based on the name; cleared by buildFiscalYear()

AccountType - Enum in com.poesys.accounting.dataloader.newaccounting
